Package bt.runtime

Interface BtClient


  • public interface BtClient
    Main API for interaction with a torrent processing worker.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isStarted​()
      Check if this client is started.
      CompletableFuture<?> startAsync​()
      Start torrent processing asynchronously in a separate thread.
      CompletableFuture<?> startAsync​(Consumer<TorrentSessionState> listener, long period)
      Start torrent processing asynchronously in a separate thread and schedule periodic callback invocations.
      void stop​()
      Stop torrent processing.

    • Method Detail

      • startAsync

        CompletableFuture<?> startAsync​()
        Start torrent processing asynchronously in a separate thread.
        Returns:
        Future, that can be joined by the calling thread or used in any other way, which is convenient for the caller.
        Since:
        1.0

      • startAsync

        CompletableFuture<?> startAsync​(Consumer<TorrentSessionState> listener,
                                long period)
        Start torrent processing asynchronously in a separate thread and schedule periodic callback invocations.
        Parameters:
        listener - Callback, that is periodically provided with an up-to-date state of torrent session.
        period - Interval at which the listener should be invoked, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Future, that can be joined by the calling thread or used in any other way, which is convenient for the caller.
        Since:
        1.0

      • stop

        void stop​()
        Stop torrent processing.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted​()
        Check if this client is started.
        Returns:
        true if this client is started
        Since:
        1.1
